name: Snooker World
description:
Snooker Online- The world's most realistic online multiplayer snooker game.

Features:

NEWBIE TRAINING
Training courses for newbie. Learn snooker skills and operations.

1-ON-1 RANDOM MATCH
Random play with world wide snooker players.

ARENA
Higher coin and experience point reward.

PLAY WITH FRIEND

CUES AND TABLES
Rich cues and tables you can select.

LEVEL UP
Level up with your wins.

LEADERBOARD
World wide ranking of players winning.

INGAME CHAT
Voice chat with player from anywhere in game.

ACHIEVEMENTS
Reach achievement to get rewards.


Cooperation contact: ouyangzy@msn.com
